summary: A young hoodlum decides to work for a criminal organization that is tearing itself apart.
cast: Hiroyuki Nagato|Jitsuko Yoshimura|Masao Mishima|Tetsurô Tanba|Shirô Ôsaka|Takeshi Katô|Shôichi Ozawa|Yôko Minamida|Hideo Sato|Eijirô Tôno|Akira Yamauchi|Sanae Nakahara|Kin Sugai|Bumon Kahara|Tomio Aoki|Kô Nishimura|Kotoe Hatsui|Toshio Takahara|Hyosuke Kobe|Takeo Yazu|Taiji Tonoyama|Hideo Kidokoro|Toyoko Takechi|Nobuo Kawakami|Shuntarô Tamamura|Hitomi Nakagawa|Ayako Fukuda|John Blooming|Robert Duncan|Hyôe Enoki|Ayako Kanda|Mitzi Mori|Tooru Moriya|Sanzô Nakagawa|Tomoko Naraoka|Takashi Nomura|Seijirô Takano|Kôji Yashiro|Osman Yusuf
title: Cerdos y acorazados
